channel.title: ORIGIN - The World Of 2007 PVP Is Now A Reality
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.minus.com/iviNTsAeoZm3k.png[/img]
Origin. An Old School PVP server that is aimed towards the 2007 Era. The idea derives from PKers from the past, they include: Bloodhoun34, Bk2lumby4u, Elvemage, etc. Anyways, the rise of OSPK servers don't fufill the 2007 era, more towards the 2007 era where the DFS's, Fury Amulets are present. I sought to go beyond that and succeed without those items and go for a custom content 2007 PVP server. How I go on to plan this is simple. Have features that PVP Servers are missing. I want to add features that aren't quite present in PVP servers and to do this I'll have ideas constructed from pure creativity in order to have the ultimate fighting experience in Origin.
SUPPORT US: [IMG]http://i.minus.com/ibw33cUv3ompff.png[/img][/center]
[CENTER]
[IMG]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110305042726/runescape/images/5/51/Attack-icon.png[/img] [B]Melee - 100% . Correct special attacks on all weapons. . Correct level requirements on all weapons. . Player poisoning which can be healed with a potion. . Player poisoning which fades away over a period of time. . Equipment bonus's and affects: Barrows, Void, etc. . Effective, Smooth, Combat
[IMG]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110305043125/runescape/images/7/77/Magic-icon.png[/img] [B]Magic - 100%[/B]
. Perfected Modern Spellbook . Correct animations for each type of spell casted . Correct Teleporting . Flawless 'Ancients' spellbook. . Perfected Veng.
[IMG]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110305043145/runescape/images/7/72/Ranged-icon.png[/img] [B]Ranged - 100%[/B]
. Projectiles. (Obsidian rings, darts, knifes, thrown-axe's, etc) . Correct level requirements for bows and arrows. . Perfected Dark bow, not overpowered. . Crystal bow degrading. . Special attacks on (e) bolts. . Ava's accumulator fully functional.
[IMG]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120509113360/runescape/images/3/30/Coins_10000.png[/img] [B]Hardcore Economy - 15%[/B]
. Strict Starter . Items are achieved by PK Points or Minigames. . Strict GP Rewards For Each Kill. . Ensured Welfare Armour. . Tier Chests Based Amount PVP Points. . Hard To Attain Various Weapons: Whips, Dark Bows, Etc.
[IMG]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20121211051932/runescape/images/6/60/Redskull.png[/img] [B]PVP - 5%[/B]
. KillStreak System With GP Rewards . Exchange of PK Points for GP. . Various of Classes: Range Tank, Pure, Zerk, Main . World PVP: Varrock Bank PVP, Lumby PVP, Cammy PVP, Etc. . Safe/Risk PVP
[IMG]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120308124439/runescape/images/thumb/d/de/Ahrim_head.png/30px-Ahrim_head.png[/img] [B]Minigames - 0%[/B]
. Duel Arena . Fight Pits with Various GP Rewards. . Free For All. . Survival Island. . Zombie's Reign . Fight Caves
[IMG]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20121018215961/runescape/images/7/74/Black_dragonhide.png[/img] [B]Bosses - 0%[/B]
. Boss Raids . Hardcore Bossing . Exotic Bosses To Fight . Bosses Hit Somewhat Through Pray. [/B] [/CENTER]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.minus.com/ibvYeE7RgruI4B.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.minus.com/ic0AzyNf4R5X0.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.minus.com/iCTGfaGVsnEqe.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.minus.com/ib8nbWV9Z23K7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.minus.com/icP11qvMbZwFh.png[/img][/CENTER]

item.title: ORIGIN - The World Of 2007 PVP Is Now A Reality
item.dc:creator: @Synergize Synergize
item.description:
@Synergize wrote:

[CENTER]

Origin. An Old School PVP server that is aimed towards the 2007 Era. The idea derives from PKers from the past, they include: Bloodhoun34, Bk2lumby4u, Elvemage, etc. Anyways, the rise of OSPK servers don’t fufill the 2007 era, more towards the 2007 era where the DFS’s, Fury Amulets are present. I sought to go beyond that and succeed without those items and go for a custom content 2007 PVP server. How I go on to plan this is simple. Have features that PVP Servers are missing. I want to add features that aren’t quite present in PVP servers and to do this I’ll have ideas constructed from pure creativity in order to have the ultimate fighting experience in Origin.

SUPPORT US:
[/center]

[CENTER]

[B]Melee - 100%
. Correct special attacks on all weapons.
. Correct level requirements on all weapons.
. Player poisoning which can be healed with a potion.
. Player poisoning which fades away over a period of time.
. Equipment bonus’s and affects: Barrows, Void, etc.
. Effective, Smooth, Combat

Magic - 100%

. Perfected Modern Spellbook
. Correct animations for each type of spell casted
. Correct Teleporting
. Flawless ‘Ancients’ spellbook.
. Perfected Veng.

Ranged - 100%

. Projectiles. (Obsidian rings, darts, knifes, thrown-axe’s, etc)
. Correct level requirements for bows and arrows.
. Perfected Dark bow, not overpowered.
. Crystal bow degrading.
. Special attacks on (e) bolts.
. Ava’s accumulator fully functional.

Hardcore Economy - 15%

. Strict Starter
. Items are achieved by PK Points or Minigames.
. Strict GP Rewards For Each Kill.
. Ensured Welfare Armour.
. Tier Chests Based Amount PVP Points.
. Hard To Attain Various Weapons: Whips, Dark Bows, Etc.

PVP - 5%

. KillStreak System With GP Rewards
. Exchange of PK Points for GP.
. Various of Classes: Range Tank, Pure, Zerk, Main
. World PVP: Varrock Bank PVP, Lumby PVP, Cammy PVP, Etc.
. Safe/Risk PVP

Minigames - 0%

. Duel Arena
. Fight Pits with Various GP Rewards.
. Free For All.
. Survival Island.
. Zombie’s Reign
. Fight Caves

Bosses - 0%

. Boss Raids
. Hardcore Bossing
. Exotic Bosses To Fight
. Bosses Hit Somewhat Through Pray.
[/B] [/CENTER]

[CENTER]




[/CENTER]

Read full topic
item.source: ORIGIN - The World Of 2007 PVP Is Now A Reality
